content:
# The error indicates that I cannot craft the burner mining drill because it requires iron plates, which I currently do not have. 
# This means I need to gather iron ore and smelt it into iron plates before I can craft the mining drill.

# Let's locate and harvest some iron ore first. 
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Moving to the iron ore position
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvesting some iron ore

# Checking inventory after harvesting iron ore
print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
